Mouse somatosensory cortex seqFISH+ dataset

Source: R/datasets.R
dataset_cortex.Rd

A processed spatial dataset from a single seqFISH+ slide of the mouse somatosensory cortex.

Usage

dataset_cortex

Format

A list with the following structure:

samples

A named list of samples. Each sample contains a data.table with:

id

Cell identifier.

x

x-coordinate of the cell.

y

y-coordinate of the cell.

celltype

Cell type annotation.

region

Region annotation.

sample_id

A character vector of sample identifiers.

Source

Eng, C.-H. L. et al. Transcriptome-scale super-resolved imaging in tissues by rna seqfish+. Nature 568, 235–239 (2019).460
